item.title: How to backup files remotely from Fedora Server 34 to Fedora Workstation 34
item.description: Things you will need: An internet connection or a local area network A computer/virtual machine with Fedora Workstation installed A computer/virtual machine with Fedora Server Installed Let’s assume that you have a Fedora Workstation 34 machine with the purpose of saving backups on it. Also, you have a Fedora Server 34. You know the root’s password and you checked Allow root SSH login with password during the installation.
